Jalur Wisata di Lombok Utara Dikeluhkan Warga
04 Nov 2019, 10:50 by Harianto Nukman


Kondisi jalan di Bukit Pusuk yang rusak parah(Harianto Nukman/detikcom)

Lombok Utara - Jalan provinsi menuju tempat wisata Kabupaten Lombok Utara di Jalur Pusuk menjadi sorotan. Kondisinya yang rusak parah dikeluhkan warga.Salah satu jalan wisata yang berada di jalur perbukitan dan posisi di bawahnya terdapat tebing itu sudah lama longsor. Kondisinya yang rusak parah dikhawatirkan dapat mengancam keselamatan para pengguna jalan."Kepada pemerintah terkait khususnya provinsi, tolong perhatikan keselamatan kami. Ini kondisi jalan Pusuk Kabupaten Lombok Utara per hari ini," kata warga setempat, Nauri Kamalo, Senin (4/11/2019)."Jangan tunggu korban berjatuhan. Sebentar lagi hujan dan otomatis jalan akan longsor, sementara banyak sekali kendaraan yang lalu lalang melintasi jalur ini," sambungnya.Ia khawatir jika jalur Pusuk itu teputus maka hanya jalan menuju Senggigi yang jadi pilihan pengendara. Sedangkan kendaraan besar yang membawa pasir dan alat berat dinilai tidak akan mampu melewati tingginya tanjakan di Bukit Malimbu."Semoga bapak gubernur dan staf pemerintahan yang terkait memperhatikan dan ambil tindakan segera," ujarnya.Dihubungi terpisah, Kabag Humas Setda Lombok Utara Mujaddid Muhas membenarkan kondisi jalan di Pusuk yang sudah lama rusak. Pihaknya mengakui sudah melaporkan, tapi hingga saat ini belum ada tindak lanjut perbaikan."Parah memang. Betul, itu di sebelah kiri, kalau dari arah Mataram. Nyaris setahun, sekitar musim hujan tahun kemarin," ungkap Mujaddid.Simak Video "Protes Jalan Rusak, Warga Polman Tanam Batang Pisang di Jalanan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sym/krs)

Tourist route in North Lombok complained by residents
Nov 04 2019, 10:50 by Harianto Nukman


Road conditions in Bukit Pusuk that are badly damaged (Harianto Nukman / detikcom)

North Lombok - The provincial road leading to the tourist attractions of North Lombok Regency on the Pusuk Path is in the spotlight. His condition was badly damaged complained by residents. One of the tourist roads in the path of the hills and the position underneath the cliff there was a long slide. It is feared that the condition is seriously damaged could threaten the safety of road users. "To the relevant government, especially the province, please pay attention to our safety. This is the condition of the Pusuk road in North Lombok Regency per day," said local resident, Nauri Kamalo, Monday (11/04/2019) "Don't wait for the victims to fall. Soon it will rain and the road will automatically landslide, while a lot of vehicles passing through this lane," he continued. He was worried that if the Pusuk line was broken then only the road to Senggigi would be the driver's choice. While large vehicles carrying sand and heavy equipment are judged not to be able to pass the high incline on Malimbu Hill. "Hopefully the governor and related government staff pay attention and take immediate action," he said. Contacted separately, North Lombok Regional Secretary of Public Relations Mujaddid Muhas confirmed the conditions the road in Pusuk which has long been damaged. He admitted that he had reported it, but until now there has been no follow-up to the improvement. "It is really bad. That's right, it's on the left, if it's from Mataram.
